title: Trump says he'd 'love not to' attack Iran, 'but sometimes you have to'
summary_full: President Donald Trump expressed frustration at Iran's refusal to comply with American demands to curb its nuclear program.
summary_public: President Donald Trump expressed frustration at Iran's refusal to comply with American demands to curb its nuclear program.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Trump says he'd 'love not to' attack Iran, 'but sometimes you have to'
